title: Ontology
description: Schema for submitting information about ontology.

ontology_url.title: Ontology URL
ontology_url.description: An external link to information about the ontology.
ontology_url.internal_comment: may not be the same url used to generate term specific url - see base_url

download_url.title: Download URL
download_url.description: URL to download the full ontology.

namespace_url.title: Namespace URL
namespace_url.description: The base URL to which a term identifier can be added to construct a url to a term.
namespace_url.internal_comment: may not be the same as home url - this to get specific terms or to use as namespace when parsing rdf

ontology_prefix.title: Ontology Prefix
ontology_prefix.descripton: Abbreviation for the ontology - should correspond to the valid prefix for the ontology eg. EFO, OBI, UBERON and be unique
ontology_prefix.comment: An identifying property that can be used for retrieval

description.title: Description
description.description: A short description of the ontology.

ontology_versions.title: Version History
ontology_versions.description: List of all deployed versions of ontology

synonym_terms.title: Synonym Terms
synonym_terms.decription: Terms that are used to denote synonyms - eg. 'exact synonym', 'alternative term' ...

definition_terms.title: Definition Terms
definition_terms.decription: Terms that are used to denote definitions - eg. 'definition', 'IAO:00000115' ...

relation_terms.title: Relationship Terms
relation_terms.decription: Terms that are used to denote relationships often found in onProperty triple - eg. 'part of', 'develops from' ...
relation_terms.internal_comment: Will only store a subset of relationships - those of interest when parsing ontologies
